title: Scheduled Maintenance - Patch 5.23 - 24/11/2015
body: On 24/11/15, starting at 05:00 Sydney Time (18:00 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 5.23. At 06:30 Sydney Time (19:30 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours.

replies.body: Wow that really creeped up on me, I haven't played league in like 2 weeks, can't wait to try Illaoi out!
Well in may opinion their are going to be 9 Illaoi's in 5 games for the next 2 weeks.

2 questions I would like answered thanks!:

1) Is the normals draft mode out yet?
2) Have you made a map of Runeterra yet?(an updated one I have the old one.)

Finally, please fix everything wrong with 5.22. I feel like this game lost a lot of it's x factor that made it fun to play just from 5.22 alone. A lot less enjoyment for winning a game, and when you lose it's not like "oh we were doing ok in teamfights and maybe could of won", instead it's "holy crap someone stop this snowball before it rolls out of my computer screen and rips my face off".

Winning feels less fulfilling.

Losing feels even more horrible.
